name: Absurd Analogy Maker
description: Rewrites the text in to and absurd analogy, such as the style of Douglas Adams
prompt:
Take the following memory and rewrite it in the most absurd or dramatic way possible:
[Place Text Here]

Rewrite:
PEX:
Take the following memory and rewrite it in the most absurd or dramatic way possible:
I saw ships in the distance, right at the horizon.

rewrite: The ships hung in the sky in much the same way that bricks donâ€™t.

##
Take the following memory and rewrite it in the most absurd or dramatic way possible:
I was walking down the hall and saw a man leaning against the wall, frowning.

rewrite: He leant tensely against the corridor wall and frowned like a man trying to unbend a corkscrew by telekinesis.

##
Take the following memory and rewrite it in the most absurd or dramatic way possible:
I was listening to him talk over the  phone, he had a deep voice and sounded sort of evil.

rewrite: It was a deep, hollow malevolent voice which sounded like molten tar glurping out of a drum with evil on its mind.
